title: zenaku
author: zenaku
content: Hello, I offer my whiteboard drawing services, illustrations, vectorized.Without kyc. I receive any payment method.Video editing.I have some jobs, write to me

comments.author: LoyceMobile
comments.created_time: September 28, 2023, 05:20:24 PMLast edit: September 28, 2023, 09:05:42 PM by LoyceMobile
comments.body: To state the obvious: this works better if you post some examples of your previous work.

comments.author: zenaku
comments.created_time: September 28, 2023, 08:23:20 PMLast edit: September 28, 2023, 08:48:11 PM by zenaku
comments.body: Quote from: LoyceMobile on September 28, 2023, 05:20:24 PMTo state the obvious: this works better if you some examples of your previous work.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: Very funny though and if I may ask can any of your client vouch for you? I will like you to post a link to your work different from what you have made available here for us to see. At least that would convince prospective clients to engage your services.You should categorically state your payment procedure and price as per job offer so that any one coming would have idea before engaging your services. I will also suggest you get an escrow from this platform who is reputable because members here would not be comfortable making payments directly to you when they are not sure of you. Do well to make your conversations here for transparency and accountability.
